/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen wind, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. A red car is parked on the left side of the street, its vibrant color contrasting with the muted tones of the surroundings. On the right side of the street, a solitary figure can be seen walking, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of natural beauty and urban life.
